name: Nova
title: Dominion Ghost
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Deal 245 damage to the first enemy hit. Passive: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 5%, stacking up to 25%. Gain an additional 25% damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 105 damage to an enemy and Slow them by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's normal damage. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroics.name: Triple Tap
heroics.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 damage each.

heroics.name: Precision Strike
heroics.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

original.name: Nova
original.title: Dominion Ghost
original.description: November "Nova" Terra is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught in her crosshairs.
original.shortDescription: A burst damage Mage who can ambush enemies from Stealth.

baseHeroInfo.name: Nova
baseHeroInfo.title: Dominion Ghost
baseHeroInfo.description: November "Nova" Terra is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught in her crosshairs.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A burst damage Mage who can ambush enemies from Stealth.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible. Passive: Gain 15% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

skins.name: Dominion Ghost
skins.description: November "Nova" Terra is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught in her crosshairs.

skins.name: Elite Agent Nova
skins.description: The Crius Stealthsuit was the ultimate hostile environment suit developed by the Terran Dominion for its ghosts. Unfortunately, due to its immense cost, few were deployed.

skins.name: Widowmaker Nova
skins.description: Once, she led a normal life... But now, after intense neural reconditioning, she is one of the most effective assassins still alive. Oh, and this skin makes her look like Widowmaker.

skins.name: Novazon
skins.description: Hailing from the Skovos Isles, the Askari, or Amazons, are skilled combatants. The young warrior Nova is an expert sharpshooter; eager to make her mark on the world.

skins.name: Roller Derby Nova
skins.description: Kate "Supernova" Dennings doesn't take any crap from her rivals on the track. Why should the Nexus be any different?

skins.name: Spectre Nova
skins.description: Nova couldn't let Tosh face his fate alone, and together they embraced the spectre program. It was her and him against the whole damn universe... just the way she liked it.
